Netorare is when the guy finds out that his partner was cheating, and cheating is just cheating without the guy finding out. Please educated yourselves with this, and thank you for reading. I hope this clears up any possible future confusion.

@Numbskull69 - Hey, man, it's fine. There's a solution for that. Go outside and touch what touches you, meaning, join a community that you feel like calls out to you. Erm, basically, try hanging out with other people that like the same things you like. Maybe join an organization that cleans trash around the city or neighborhood or something. Or maybe just buy a dog if you're an adult, man's best friend. If you long for the love of a woman (based on your other comments, seems to be the case) then...I'll be honest, I have no idea what to tell you other than to try and surpass your best self. Exercise, eat healthy, pick up some useful skills, anything that will make you a better person. This will not only help you physically and mentally, but may very well help you in gaining a partner.  But you must start now, or when YOU know it's possible. Start by dropping this site, if you feel like you're using too much, that is. Focus on bettering yourself. Good luck.
